SELECT si.id, si.material_name AS materialName, si.material_type AS materialType, si.measurement_unit AS measurementUnit, si.quantity, si.transaction_type AS transactionType, si.create_date AS createDate, si.remark, si.model, si.unit_price AS unitPrice, si.inbound_order_number AS inboundOrderNumber, si.delivery_order_number AS deliveryOrderNumber FROM storehouse_info si WHERE si.transaction_type = 0
and si.material_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storehouseInfo.materialName},'%')
and si.model LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storehouseInfo.model},'%')
and si.material_type = #{storehouseInfo.materialType}
ORDER BY si.create_date DESC

SELECT si.id, si.material_name AS materialName, si.measurement_unit AS measurementUnit, si.model, si.material_type AS materialType, si.unit_price AS unitPrice, si.quantity,
si.inbound_order_number AS orderNumber, sr.create_date AS createDate
si.delivery_order_number AS orderNumber, osr.create_date AS createDate
FROM storehouse_info si
LEFT JOIN storage_record sr on sr.code = si.inbound_order_number
LEFT JOIN out_stock_record osr on osr.code = si.delivery_order_number
WHERE 1 = 1 AND si.transaction_type = #{transactionType} AND si.material_name = #{name} ORDER BY
sr.create_date DESC
osr.create_date DESC
